history.proof: pose (Ring_polynom.norm_subst (fun n => P n \/ ~ P n)) as H'.

exceptions.tactic: pose (classical_pick (fun n => P n \/ ~ P n)) as H'.

ctx: pose (Ring_polynom.norm_subst (fun n => P n \/ ~ P n)) as H'.

original: intros P H. pose (classical_pick (fun n => P n \/ ~ P n)) as H'. destruct H' as [[n H1] | H1]. - left. exists n. split. + apply H1. + intros i H2. apply H1. intro. apply H2 in H3. contradiction. - right. intro n. apply not_or_and_not in H1. apply H1.
